name: John of Fury 3D
description:
John of Fury 3D is a third person story driven shooter set in a Sci-Fi city, where John must protect the city at all costs from what he thinks is a monster invasion.

The player controls the main character 'John' throughout the game the player must balance combat and keeping John's alcohol level up to stop John from losing health. 

As the player progresses through the levels, they will be introduced to different enemy types that they must defeat to progress further through this harsh world.
